messages.subject: Re: Good Vibrations Unschooling Conference in Sept  2011
messages.msgSnippet: The San Diego Good Vibrations Unschooling Conference is only 3 months away! If you re interested in attending, check out the website here:
messages.messageBody:
The San Diego Good Vibrations Unschooling Conference is only 3 months away! If
you're interested in attending, check out the website here:
http://goodvibrationsconference.com/
Register and book your hotel room today. It really is so much fun to stay at the
hotel if you're able to. There's lots of really fun Funshops happening. My
daughter, Olivia is hosting a Ninjago Lego Funshop. There's also going to be a
full art room hosted by Spramani E'Laun and Nature of Art Kids. Many great
speakers including Sandra Dodd, Blake Boles, Phil Biegler, Robin Coburn, Holly
Dodd, Ronnie Maier, and Tiffani Bearup. The chat circles are a great intimate
opportunity to ask questions about unschooling . And, you're sure to have lots
of fun at the many activities planned; beach potluck, pool party, surfing
lessons, artisan bazaar, & more!

If you have any great ideas for a Funshop, something your kids are passionate
about or that you are passionate about be sure to sign up under the Funshop
page.

Hope to see you there!!!

Mandy Sicard

messages.subject: Good Vibrations Unschooling Conference in Sept  2011
messages.msgSnippet: Just a reminder that the Good Vibrations Unschooling Conference will be held September 8-11, 2011 in Del Mar, San Diego, CA. Early bird registration ends May
messages.messageBody:
Just a reminder that the Good Vibrations Unschooling Conference will be held September 8-11, 2011 in Del Mar, San Diego, CA. Early bird registration ends May 31st. This year's conference includes Sandra Dodd, Holly Dodd, Phil Biegler, Blake Boles and several more! It's held at the beautiful Doubletree Hotel just minutes from beautiful Torrey Pines Beach. Wonderful place to spend your vacation and go to an unschooling conference. Be sure to register and get a special great rate on a room at the Doubletree soon!

The conference website can be found here:


http://goodvibrationsconference.com/



Mandy Sicard
